refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: flag = assert_checkfalse ( condition ) flag = assert_checkfalse ( condition ) [flag,errmsg] = assert_checkfalse ( condition )

listitem.para: a 1-by-1 matrix of boolean, %t if condition is false, %f if not
a 1-by-1 matrix of strings, the error message. If flag==%t, then errormsg=="". If flag==%f, then errmsg contains the error message.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Performs silently if all entries in condition are false.
Generates an error if any entry in condition is true. Generates an error if condition is not a boolean.
